descriptions: Welcome to Code Betting! You need 21 to win.
Your card is a seven. What do you do next?
Wow, thanks for asking nicely? Luck doesn't care about being nice. You draw a king.
Next card is a ten! What do you do? You need a 4 to win.
Congrats! The dealer deals a four.
Draw a two. So close. That's what you get for being nice.
Good choice. No going back now.
options: Fold and bow out of the game.
Take a long shot a draw.
Increase your bet and get a deal.
Fold and take your money back.
Quit gambling forever and focus on your friends and family.
